title: RI handling fails on Windows

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
It should have 

```
assert_raises(ValueError, clone, 'Zoidberg', path='ssh://mars:Zoidberg')
```

But did:

```
======================================================================
380ERROR: datalad.distribution.tests.test_clone.test_invalid_args
```
